item.title: Edit B2B Event Sessions in Premier Pro - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking an intermediate level video editor in Premier Pro to edit sessions for a recent B2B tech event.

We have raw footage from several different camera angles that you will need to combine in an interested way for sessions that total 20 to 60 minutes.

You will also have access to the Powerpoint presentations, and in each session, you should switch between camera angles, zoom-in shots (where you zoom into an existing piece of footage to make it look like yet another camera angle that is zoomed in), b-roll from the event which we'll provide and the presentation.

This needs to be done in a professional way that keeps things visually interesting for the audience to watch. You should have some experience with this type of editing and be able to make calls on these types of post-production decisions without much direction.

All assets you create and all files, including source files, must be stored on our shared drive.

You need to sign an NDA for this job.

You need to be able to deliver the first session by 5pm CST, June 17. This project is heavily time-sensitive and we need to work fast.

You are a great candidate for this opportunity if:
1 - You are at an intermediate or better level of skill in Pr and have put together b2b videos for companies before.
2 - You respond quickly, we expect deliverable turnarounds every 12-24 hours during business days.
3 - You are creative and cooperative and speak good English
4 - You are comfortable coordinating through Upwork messenger, Gmail and shared drives - we would only have a meeting if we get stuck and need to collaborate to keep things moving
5 - You have experience with working with professional organizations and doing professional-level work. Even better if you have worked with software / SaaS / tech companies before.

This is one of many projects we anticipate having in the near future. If we could find someone that is fast, high-quality and great to work with, we will plan to continue to use that person's services.

Happy to share more details and answer any questions once we start the project. Looking forward to working with you!

*You may NOT use this work in your portfolio or share with any other party.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 00:46 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Top Video editor for youtube Urgent! - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a Top Video Editor who meets the following criteria:
● Editing/Motion Graphics
● $25 per video
● Length of video: 10-18 minutes
● 3 videos per week
● Experience the Spiritual niche

My competitor channels:
● https://youtube.com/@wisdomdream?si=S3CyvcVGGCjucPf8
● https://youtube.com/@eyeofwisdom87?si=EvIOgHzqBbkqckks
● https://youtube.com/@powerthatisinsideyou?si=ujd1oGN79CvE6soZ

Please only react if you can make the exact same style of edits like the channels i added. (Custom photos made to connect to the story of the script)

I’d like to see samples of the work you’ve done before.
Please reply with the word “Read” at the beginning of your message so
that I know that you’ve read the requirements so that we can get started as soon as possible. Thank you!

Budget: $1,500
Posted On: June 16, 2024 00:43 UTC
Category: Video Editing

item.title: Short clip video editor needed for High Quality content - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! I'm looking for a video editor to us out on Tiktok

I have a team for 30+ freelancers working on automated Youtube channels. Right now I am looking for someone to work close with me in creating a really viral channel around faceless channel business tips.

We will post on Titkok/YT Shorts. You need to have pretty high level of video editing skills. I prefer if you edit in after effects to get everything smooth like butter with transitions and effects!

This can become a good high paying opportunity, right now I am testing the waters but I am looking for a savage to be my person to go along on this mission

Apply if this sounds interesting to get more information!

Budget: $1,000

item.title: I need a video editor and Narrator for my channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hello I will provide the script and I need someone who can edit my videos plus use a realistic voiceover that doesn't sound like AI. I need someone who can edit the details has exactly it sounded by the narrator. I don't want someone who put videos and images together. I need someone who can actually edit meaning bring words life.

item.title: Create viral videos for product launch - Upwork
item.description:
Role Overview:

We are seeking a creative and energetic Viral Video Creator. Your primary responsibility will be to produce compelling and shareable video content that highlights our innovative product features and drives engagement across social media platforms.

Key Responsibilities:

• Create engaging and high-quality videos showcasing app's features.
• Develop creative concepts and video scripts that resonate with our target audience.
• Utilize trending topics and viral content strategies to maximize video reach.
• Edit and optimize videos for various social media platforms (TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, etc.).

Requirements:

• Proven experience in creating viral video content, preferably for tech or app products.
• In-depth understanding of social media trends and algorithms.
• Ability to work independently and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
• Portfolio of previous viral videos created.

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 15, 2024 23:56 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Media & Entertainment, Social Media Marketing, Video Production
Skills: Media & Entertainment, Social Media Marketing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: 360 Video Editing - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a video editor to take my Insta360 video files, and produce a flat file for easy viewing and distribution.  The video footage is really just for personal use.  Family videos, personal travels, etc.  These are not commercial videos.  The audience is for friends and family.  I am looking for one person who would be more go-to person for all videos that fall in this category.  I basically would have work probably once a month.  The scope of the work also changes, as it depends on the length of the raw files.  So, some months the work would be more, and in some other months the work will be less.  For example, right now I have a series of insta360 video files with footage covering about 50-60 minutes.  I would like a final video of about 3 minutes.  So not sure what is the most appropriate approach for quote.  Generally speaking, I would like to have the final product to be about 5% in length of the original files.


Posted On: June 15, 2024 23:55 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:360-Degree Video Editing, Video Editing
Skills: 360-Degree Video Editing, Video Editing
Country: Hong Kong
click to apply

item.title: AI Image/Video Creation Assistant - Upwork
item.description:
I am producing a series of AI-generated short films, movies, and TV series for YouTube that are designed to teach languages.  I'm looking for an assistant for the production of AI images and video..

I will be writing scripts for these short films/movies and noting where AI videos are needed, trying to describe with as much detail what is needed.  Then, you will take those prompts and create AI videos (or AI images to run through an AI video generator) and review them with me.  This is a relatively fun and easy job.

Duties:
- Work with me to understand what images/videos are needed for each script.  I will try to create a detailed shot list.
- generating AI images
- generating AI video

Skills:
- AI Image/Video generation with Midjourney, Pika, Runway, Stable Video Diffusion, Luma Labs, Sora, etc.  Let me know if you have any experience in any of these.



Hourly Range: $7.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 15, 2024 23:35 UTC
Category: AI Video Generation & Editing
Skills:AI Image Generation, AI Video Generation, AI Video Generator
Skills: AI Image Generation, AI Video Generation, AI Video Generator
Country: United States
click to apply
